content: I do not have access to the most recent updates or news regarding any event, so i cannot provide information about the current process that depeche mode goes through to prepare for a major concert. however, based on general information, the process typically involves a team of professionals responsible for different aspects of the show, such as stage design, lighting, sound, and video production. the band members are usually involved in the song selection process and have significant input into the setlist. they may also have some input into the design and layout of the stage and overall production. the band and the production team work closely together to ensure that the show meets the band's vision for the performance and delivers a memorable experience to the audience.
